mdRecord.dcterms:title: View from the Steps of the Old Methodist Church Looking Toward Storkers Knob
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 660_E Main Storkers Knob; Field full of shocks of wheat or hay shown flooded and frozen; blocks of ice were cut out to fill ice houses; Conner home (black family) in background and Part of Captain Duncan home visible on present Woods Gap Road (Sleepy Hollow).
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
